frontpagetext: The second health atlas on day surgery describes the development in scope and variation between the health trusts' admission areas for the same twelve procedures as in the first day surgery atlas, this time for the period 2013–2017.
ingress: The fact sheets provide a brief description of the patient samples, as well as information about the population’s use of services in geographical areas (hospital referral areas). The use is measured as the number of events per 1,000 population or as the proportion of patients that receive a certain service. The fact sheets also include brief comments on the variation in use between geographical areas.

innhold.tekst: More results and analyzes can be found in the [report](/helseatlas/files/healthcare-atlas-elderly.pdf).
